mapper.delete: delete from p_rdEquipment where companyId=#{companyId} and `month`=#{month}
mapper.select: select pre.id, pre.rdHour, e.usagePower from p_rdEquipment pre LEFT JOIN equipment e ON e.ecode = pre.ecode AND e.companyId = pre.companyId WHERE pre.projectId = #{projectId} and month = #{month} order by pre.ecode

select ie.effect,e.ename,e.emodal,ie.ecode,sum(pr.rdHour) as yearHour from i_equipment ie INNER JOIN rdEquipment re on re.companyId=ie.companyId and re.ecode=ie.ecode and re.year=ie.year INNER join equipment e on ie.ecode=e.ecode and ie.companyId=e.companyId INNER join p_rdEquipment pr on ie.ecode=pr.ecode and ie.companyId=pr.companyId and ie.projectId=pr.projectId where ie.projectId=#{projectId} and ie.companyId=#{companyId} and re.etype != 40001 and ie.year=#{year} group by ie.effect,e.ename,e.emodal,ie.ecode

select re.rdHour, de.workHours from (select rdHour, ecode, `month`, companyId from p_rdEquipment where projectId = #{query.projectId} and `month` = #{query.month} order by rdHour desc limit 1) as re inner join d_equipment de on de.companyId = re.companyId and de.month = re.month and de.ecode = re.ecode

select pre.id,de.depreciation,pre.rdDepreciation,pre.powerRate,e.ecode,e.ename,pre.rdHour,pre.rdRatio, re.etype,pre.powerUnitPrice, e.usagePower from p_rdEquipment pre INNER JOIN rdEquipment re on re.companyId=pre.companyId and re.ecode=pre.ecode and re.year=#{year} inner join d_equipment de on de.companyId = pre.companyId and de.month = pre.month and de.ecode = pre.ecode inner join equipment e on e.companyId = pre.companyId and e.ecode = pre.ecode where pre.id in
#{id}

select d.ecode,d.workHours,d.depreciation,(d.workHours - sum(pre.rdHour)) as remainHour,d.month from d_equipment d left join p_rdEquipment pre on pre.companyId = d.companyId and pre.month = d.month and pre.ecode = d.ecode and pre.projectId != #{projectId} where d.companyId = #{companyId} and d.month in (#{m}) and d.ecode in (#{ecode}) group by d.companyId,d.ecode,d.month

select d.ecode, d.workHours, d.depreciation, (d.workHours - sum(pre.rdHour)) as remainHour, d.month from d_equipment d left join p_rdEquipment pre on pre.companyId = d.companyId and pre.month = d.month and pre.ecode = d.ecode where d.companyId = #{companyId} and d.month = #{month} group by d.companyId, d.ecode, d.month

select count(distinct ie.companyId, ie.projectId, ie.ecode) expectation, count(distinct pre.companyId, pre.projectId, pre.ecode) actuality from i_equipment ie left join p_rdEquipment pre on pre.companyId = ie.companyId and pre.projectId = ie.projectId and pre.ecode = ie.ecode where ie.companyId = #{companyId} and ie.projectId = #{projectId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO p_rdEquipment (createTime,lastUpdateTime,creatorId,lastUpdatorId,msCreatorId,msLastUpdatorId, companyId,projectId,`month`,rdDepreciation,ecode,rdHour) VALUES
(#{l.createTime},#{l.lastUpdateTime},#{l.creatorId},#{l.lastUpdatorId},#{l.msCreatorId},#{l.msLastUpdatorId}, #{l.companyId},#{l.projectId},#{l.month},#{l.rdDepreciation},#{l.ecode},#{l.rdHour})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rdDepreciation=values(rdDepreciation), rdHour=values(rdHour), msLastUpdatorId=values(msLastUpdatorId), lastUpdatorId=values(lastUpdatorId), lastUpdateTime=values(lastUpdateTime), powerUnitPrice=values(powerUnitPrice), powerRate=values(powerRate)
